product_name: ExuvianceAGE REVERSE + Rebuild-5 Firming & Moisturizing Face Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingExuviance's AGE REVERSE + Rebuild-5 Firming & Moisturizing Face Cream supports 5 of skin's essential building blocks for plumper, firmer skin, defined cheekbones and a contoured jawline. With 5 Rejuvenating Ingredients: MicroDiPeptide229, Peony Botanical, Aminofil, PHA, Vitamin E.
details: DetailsBenefitsExuviance's patented technology using MicroDiPeptide229, formulated together with Aminofil, Peony Botanical and antioxidants- PHA and Vitamin E- visibly rejuvenates for skin that looks plumper and firmer with defined cheekbones and a more contoured jawlineAGE REVERSE + Rebuild-5 Cream contains MicroDiPeptide229 is a dermatologist developed peptide that took over 8 years of research and development. This micro-sized peptide has been created for optimal delivery into the skin's surfaceThis scientifically proven molecule supports all five of skin's natural building blocks including Elastin, Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid - to resist future signs of aging for naturally youthful looking skinItem 2577622How To UseGently massage over cleansed face twice daily. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.Precautions: For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical assistance.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Isohexadecane, Gluconolactone, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Glycerides, Glycolic Acid, Glyceryl Dilaurate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Acetyl Dipeptide-31 Amide, Acetyl Tyrosinamide, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Paeonia Albiflora Root Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Squalane, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Isocetyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Bis-Isobutyl PPG-20 Crosspolymer, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-100 Stearate, Steareth-10, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Silica, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Isostearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Sclerotium Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-40 Stearate, Disodium EDTA, Polysorbate 60, Ceteareth-20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Isoceteth-10, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently massage over cleansed face twice daily. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.Precautions: For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical assistance.

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer!
reviews.comments: This is by far the best moisturizer I have tried so far! I did NOT want to soend that much money because I knew I would like it. I even went back to my old moisturizer and tried to tell myself there was no difference. But I just couldn't lie to myself - there is such a difference when I started using this moisturizer! My fine lines almost disappeared, and do when I am hydrated. My skin is plumper, and glows with a smoother finish. No other moisturizer has given me the results this one has!

reviews.headline: I would by this product s long as my funds will allow me too
reviews.comments: Leaves my skin so soft and hydrated. Used many moisturizers and this one by far has been the best.  It is a bit pricey though

reviews.headline: Excellent product  !!!
reviews.comments: It really changed my skin to the best !!!

reviews.headline: Happy skin
reviews.comments: I just purchased my second jar of this cream. It's non greasey and absorbs quickly.  Skin stays hydrated all day. Fine lines are less visible. I highly recommend giving this cream a try

reviews.headline: Dried me out
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this. I had Charlotte Tilbury moisturizing products in my hand, and the sales girl at the checkout asked if I wanted to try something better.  She handed me this, and at first, it was ok. After a couple of weeks, my skin was so dry and rough. I returned it.

reviews.headline: sample
reviews.comments: Based in the sample size I received in a gift with purchase bundle it's terrible. It isn't creamy it feels more like a balm and doesn't rub into the skin, it pills, and it feels like little "scrubbies" are in it ... it's so strange. I don't know how to include a picture of it. And some reviews mentioning the smell of it ... this has no fragrance at all. Maybe since it's a small sample size it's old or a bad batch, something like that. But this is no cream.

reviews.headline: My new go too
reviews.comments: Awesome my new moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Pills
reviews.comments: I like the cream although I do agree with others the fragrance is a bit strong.  But you cannot put any other product on top of this cream.  On the weekends when I use no makeup, it's fine.  But during the week when I apply my foundation, it begins to just roll up under your fingertips.  I would recommend it for a night cream only or when you are not layering anything on top of it.

reviews.headline: Love this product.
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product. My face feels amazing

reviews.headline: WOW
reviews.comments: Fabulous impact in 2 short weeks!

reviews.headline: Don't waste your money!
reviews.comments: The fragrance is so bad and so strong, it's nauseating. It dries out my skin like no other moisturizer I've ever used. I will not buy this brand again, such a waste of money!

reviews.headline: too soon to determine
reviews.comments: It has not been a month yet, so it is too soon to rate it totally.  Up to now I do not see any difference.

reviews.headline: Not happy with this product
reviews.comments: Purchased this based on information given by apparently a rep for the product.. .. product didn't work for me and left me with a burning sensation.

reviews.headline: perfection
reviews.comments: my mom loves this moisturizer. people need to make sure they are using the products with the right items. sometimes people mix products that don't work well together. so be mindful of what your mixing in your skin care.if you use this moisturizer with the peel and the total Sculpt Serum you will see a different.  my mom loves this.

reviews.headline: I would buy again and again.
reviews.comments: Love this cream/moisturizer.   Best I have ever found!

reviews.headline: really great product.
reviews.comments: am enjoying using this and can already see some improvement

reviews.headline: Be careful…
reviews.comments: If you have sensitive skin, dont use this product. I am 28 years old and very new to the skincare game so i know very little about what works and what doesnt. I was sold 5 products from this line and had to return everything because of burning, irritating scaly rashes that developed around my eyes. I found out later that this brand is designed for 40-50 plus skin types who have already been using advanced skincare formulas for years. Good rule of thumb for my sensitive skin girlies, just because it's expensive does not mean itll work better. Try starting out with the inexpensive basics. Your skin will thank you.

reviews.headline: Decent Moisturizer.
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is ok.  I like the way it feels.  My skin soaks it up quick. It doesn't feel greasy.  The drawback is that for this price I would expect more in the jar.  I have found other moisturizers that do the same thing for less money.  I have been using it for about a month now and can't say it is life changing.

reviews.headline: This product is amazing!
reviews.comments: I am especially grateful for the advice of the young man who recommended it.

reviews.headline: Gummy, Pilling, Not absorbing
reviews.comments: This was great at first, but as I've gotten through half of the jar, it's gotten gummy and started pilling. I exfoliate and use it properly but no matter how long I let it absorb, it starts to pill without even touching it. Little white rolls at the side of my face and on my neck. It's expensive, too. Very disappointed. I was hoping this would be an empty I'd brag about and repurchase, but it's such a problem fhat i can't even wear it at night. The Hydrafirm is even worse. Always gummy and pilling, it didn't even give you a honeymooon period when it was new. Seems like a formula problem.

faceoff_positive.comments: Exuviance Age Reverse + Rebuild-5 Cream is a luxurious anti-aging cream. For the past month, I have been using it as a before bedtime moisturizer, so in the morning I wake up and my skin is feeling smoother and glowing. Those little fine lines are definitely looking less noticeable. With all the anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties along with Vitamin E that helps to smooth the skin and provide moisture, and glycerin, which is a hydrator and adds water to the skin, I am feeling rejuvenated and younger-looking, and people are noticing. It is a whipped, thick rich texture, not at all greasy and smells so sweet. There is a definite improvement in firmness and a lift to my cheeks. I would recommend for anyone who wants to turn back the clock on aging.  It is a definite top of the list addition to my skin routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: A luxurious anti-aging cream

faceoff_negative.comments: I was Really excited to try this and will admit that I never spend this amount of $$ on a face cream but I had high hopes going in. This feels very nice on the skin with minimal scent but I'm at the end of the jar and won't repurchase. I've noticed basically no change in my skin but that isn't even the main reason that I would not repurchase or recommend.  I have a very strict night routine...wash, toner, serums, moisturizer and then face oil. When using this product, even if I wait a full hour between this and oil, it pills beyond belief! It does not play well with any of the multiple facial oils that I use...it just rolls off my face in big balls of yuck! There are just too many Good products out there for me to waste my money on this. I can only say that I'm thankful that I purchased when on sale...
faceoff_negative.headline: exuviance age reverse
